Button4.Text: Palauta Windowsin automaattinen ajurien asennus oletus asetukseen

Label4.Text: *** Pidätkö ohjelmasta DDU? Harkitse lahjoitusta, mikä auttaa ohjelman kehittämisessä jatkossa. ***

Label9.Text: Huomautus: Mikä tahansa tietokoneelle aiheutettu vaurio tai virhe on omalla vastuullasi.

Label11.Text2: Ei löytynyt päivityksiä. Ohjelma on ajantasalla.
Label11.Text3: Päivityksiä löydetty! Vanhemman version tuki on huonompaa.

Messages.Text1: Päivityksiä saatavilla! Vieraile DDU verkkosivulla nyt?
Messages.Text2: Vanhemman version tuki on huonompaa kuin uuden. Ennen virheiden raportointa, tarkista uusin versio.
Messages.Text3: You are not using DDU with Administrator privileges. The application will now exit.
Messages.Text4: Unable to find ddudr. Please refer to the log.
Messages.Text5: Display Driver Uninstaller (DDU) is modifying your registry a lot. DDU will try to automatically create a System Restore point (Normal mode Only).
Messages.Text6: A problem occured in one of the module, send your DDU logs to the developer.
Messages.Text7: DDU detected that you have an AMD switching Laptop (Enduro or equivalent), DDU is not yet fully compatible / tested with Enduro systems, Use at your own risk.
Messages.Text8: DDU has detected that you are NOT in SafeMode... For a better CleanUP without issues, it is recommended that you reboot into safemode.
Messages.Text9: DDU has changed a setting that prevents drivers to be downloaded automatically with Windows Update. You can set this back to default, if you want AFTER your new driver installation.
Messages.Text10: Puhdan asennuksen poisto on valmis! Haluaisitko sulkea ohjelman?
Messages.Text12: Et ole vikasietotilassa. On erittäin suositeltavaa käynnistää uudelleen vikasietotilaan virheiden välttämiseksi. Käynnistä uudelleen vikasietotilaan?
Messages.Text13: Here is what you need to select at the blue recovery screen : Troubleshoot-> advanced options -> startup Settings.
Messages.Text14: There is a pending Reboot, please reboot before using DDU

UpdateLog.Text1: Executing Driver Store cleanUP(Delete OEM step)...
UpdateLog.Text3: Cleaning known Regkeys... May take a minute or two.
UpdateLog.Text4: Cleaning UpdatusUser users account if present.
UpdateLog.Text8: Starting the removal of nVidia Optimus UpperFilter if present.
UpdateLog.Text19: Deleting some specials folders, it may take some times...
UpdateLog.Text23: Executing ddudr Remove , Please wait(can take a few minutes)
UpdateLog.Text27: 3D Vision USB Adapter Removed from Device Manager.

CheckBox9.Text: Poista AMDKMPFD ajuri (Varmuuskopio AMD piirisarjan omistaville suositeltavaa)

CheckBox12.Text: Älä tarkista ohjelman päivityksiä käynnistäessä (EI suositeltavaa)

CheckBox14.Text: Poista AMD Crimson Shader Cache kansio
CheckBox14.Tooltip: Recommended if there is graphicals anomaly (speed or visual corruption) caused by a corrupted shader cache data.|Also recommended if you are switching to another brand like nVidia.

lblNotSafeMode.Text: Et ole vikasietotilassa. On erittäin suositeltavaa|käynnistää uudelleen vikasietotilaan

Label1.Text:
Display Driver Uninstaller (DDU) / Cleaner made for Display (GPU) Drivers.(NVIDIA/AMD)
What it does is remove the display/GPU driver from device manager and remove the current and all precedent driver(s) from the Windows Driver store along with removing services from NVIDIA/AMD.
The current effect after you use this tool will be similar to if Windows was in a "Fresh Install" state.
This tool acts much like "Driver Sweeper"*, and has all the extra mentioned above.
If you have any problems installing an older driver or a newer one, give it a try as there are some reports that it fixes those problems.
RECOMMENDED USAGE :
-The tool can be used in Normal mode but for absolute stability when using DDU, Safe Mode is always the best.
- We would like to gather feedback from everyone, tell us if it was successful or not.
- Make a backup or a system restore. (but it should normally be pretty safe.)
-If you have or had a driver problem, and this tool helped you with some issues you were or are currently experiencing, please share your result.
Keep in mind that NVIDIA, AMD, nor Microsoft can be held responsible for any damages to you or your computer and are in no way affiliates of DDU, or it's creators. -------------------------------
Created By Wagnard.
Co-owner: Shady757
Tester : Dellon132
Logos : juanchacin
Huge Thanks to Jackalito for the donation of a AMD 7850.
Thanks to Helge Klein (http://helgeklein.com/setacl/) : for the permission to use his Program with DDU "SetAcl"
Huge Thanks for their time for testing : Gamer1291 (optimus), Octopuss (Amd Enduro) , nedooo` (took time debugging with me) Extraordinary (Testing a bug fix)
Thanks to anyone who put their system at risk. (special thanks to Dellon132)
*DDU, it's creators and affiliates are in no way affiliated with Driver Sweeper, or it's creators.

Tos.Text:
Display Driver Uninstaller ("DDU") USER AGREEMENT
You become a user of DDU ("User") by using the DDU software. This Agreement takes effect as soon as you use the program to uninstall a driver.
By using DDU you agree to not accuse DDU or it's creators, and affiliates, of damaging or negatively affecting your PC.
By using DDU you acknowledge that NVIDIA ("NVIDIA, GeForce") nor Advanced Micro Devices ("AMD, Radeon") have anything to do with this program, and in no way affiliates of DDU or it's creators.
